name: PraxisPro AI
description: PraxisPro empowers outside sales representatives with on-the-go, real-time intelligent sales training, enabling them to boost revenue by delivering impactful interactions with customers within their territory and reducing out-of-territory training costs.
one_liner: PraxisPro empowers outside sales representatives with on-the-go, real-time intelligent sales training, enabling them to boost revenue by delivering impactful interactions with customers within their territory and reducing out-of-territory training costs.
